channel.title: I have too many questions
channel.description:
I need help with several things, I'm only a little kid, don't yell plz :(
Ok first.. WHY THE HELL AREN'T PEOPLE EVER ON 127.0.0.1 I'm getting LONELY, my best friends say they play it, but when I enter the ::players code it says "There are 1 players!" 2) How do I change detail modes 3) Why is it that when I equip a mouse toy, it says I'm using dwarf remains as a weapon? 4) Why do all the NPC's I spawn have 0 hp??? 5) Why are the attacks so funky?
Thank you for all your help :)[br][size=1]Posted at: October 30, 2006, 09:02:13 PM[/size][hr]Come on people, help me out.

item.title: I have too many questions

item.description:
@uncfan1119 wrote:

The soruce of hybrid scape, but dude, for moparscape questions are www.moparisthebest.com/smf ok. good luck (trys not to be mean to little guy)

item.title: I have too many questions
item.dc:creator: @Scape_Claw Scape Claw
item.description:
@Scape_Claw wrote:

OHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH
DUH
I should have known that…
Lol I don’t have much of an attention span, and my console is stuck on hidden :mad:[br][size=1]Posted at: October 30, 2006, 09:38:48 PM[/size][hr]So how do I create NPC’s with more than 0 hp?
I want my Kalphite Queen to not be owned by a guy with a fist![br][size=1]Posted at: October 30, 2006, 09:40:05 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Death_666, post:2, topic:21112”]becuse you are in hybridscape[/quote]

Dammit, how do I not be in Hybridscape?[br][size=1]Posted at: October 30, 2006, 09:40:41 PM[/size][hr]Well, try to answer this one.
Why can’t I attack the Kalphite Queen First Form I spawned?

Read full topic

LOL 127.0.0.1 is the server you created, and is the localhost (meaning only you can play on the server, people can’t come to it)

I need help with several things, I’m only a little kid, don’t yell plz

Ok first…
WHY THE HELL AREN’T PEOPLE EVER ON 127.0.0.1
